---

You are welcome to open a Pull Request on GitHub.
Before doing so, please read our [PR Guidelines](https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3/wiki/PR-Guidelines).

If you

- want to add a new `Learner`, `PipeOp` or `Measure` you can check out the chapter
[extending](https://mlr3book.mlr-org.com/extending.html) of the mlr3 book.
- are interested in creating a new *R package* for the mlr3 ecosystem or collaborate on an existing one, you can contact us on [Mattermost](https://lmmisld-lmu-stats-slds.srv.mwn.de/mlr_invite/).

Additional developer information lives in the mlr3 GitHub [Wiki](https://github.com/mlr-org/mlr3/wiki).
